entries.title: Op-ed: Oil CEO Sultan Al Jaber is the ideal person to lead the UN climate conference this year
entries.description: Some climate activists were aghast when the UAE named the CEO of the Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) as president of this year's COP 28.

entries.title: A battle between Disney and activist Peltz brews. Here’s how the situation may unfold
entries.description: Activist investor Nelson Peltz wants a seat on Disney’s board, and a proxy fight may be simmering.

entries.title: Iran executes British-Iranian national despite UK, U.S. pleas
entries.description: British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly said late on Friday Iran must not follow through with the execution - a call echoed by the U.S. State Department.

entries.title: Judge unseals section of Trump deposition in rape-defamation lawsuit by writer E. Jean Carroll
entries.description: The writer E. Jean Carroll is suing Donald Trump for defaming her by saying she lied in claiming he raped her in the mid-1990s in New York City.
